game.name: CrocApoca!! Crocodile maiden at the End of the World
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 고압적인 의붓누나랑 무슨 불가사의한 조직이 당신의 앞을 가로막는 동안 깜찍한 악어 소녀도 돌봐주고 재앙에서 살아남으세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take care of a cute crocodile girl and make it through the Apocalypse while your bossy step-sister and some mysterious organizations are getting in your way!
game.developers: Nupu Neko Dev, the last evil wizard
